# Contributing to BuildBot Game

Thank you for your interest in contributing to our Minecraft-style pixel art game!

## Development Setup

1. Clone the repository
2. Run `npm install` to install dependencies
3. Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
4. Open `http://localhost:5173` in your browser

## Code Style

- Use TypeScript for all game logic
- Follow the existing pixel art style for models
- Keep voxel models optimized for performance
- Comment complex game mechanics

## Submitting Changes

1. Create a feature branch from `develop`
2. Make your changes with clear commit messages
3. Test your changes thoroughly
4. Submit a pull request to `develop`

## Pixel Art Guidelines

- Use 16x16 or 32x32 textures for blocks
- Models should use voxel-based geometry with pixel art textures
- Maintain consistent art style across all objects
- Optimize polygon count while keeping visual quality

## Reporting Issues

- Check existing issues first
- Provide clear reproduction steps
- Include browser/system information
- Add screenshots or videos if applicable
